postScreen.notice2: If video is longer you will be given option to trim to 30 seconds.

videoUploadInterface.instructions1: To post your video, add a title and press the UPLOAD button.

videoUploadInterface.alertFailedUploadTryAgain: Failed to upload video. Please try again.

cameraScreen.cameraNotReadyMessage: The camera is not ready yet. Please wait a moment and try again.
cameraScreen.lowStorageMessage: You have less than 50MB of free space. Please free up some space before recording.
cameraScreen.cameraMicPermissionMessage: Camera and microphone permissions are required to record video.
cameraScreen.mediaLibraryPermissionMessage: Media library permission is required to save video.
cameraScreen.saveToGalleryErrorMessage: Failed to save video to the gallery.
